Name: Ludu
About the game: Ludu (« ash » in breton) is a free adventure game created with RPG Maker 2003. You play a character living peacefully in his small house and, when he leaves home, discovers a shadow of himself and tries to follow it. You progress through the game by solving riddles, and discover what is this strange shadow you see constantly. Ludu won the 'Bronze Alex' at the Alex d'Or 2013, and the award 'Best Level-design' !
